name: Arcing Smash
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
Destroy target opposing equipment and all opposing equipment with the same cost as that equipment.
"When helms are cracked, skulls aren't far behind." - Codex of Defense

name: Ashtongue Battlelord
effect:
Traitor Hero: When Ashtongue Battlelord enters play, destroy target undamaged opposing ally.
Loyal Hero: When Ashtongue Battlelord enters play, destroy all damaged opposing allies.

name: Ashtongue Rogue
effect:
Traitor Hero: Elusive, Ferocity
Loyal Hero: Long-Range, Stealth
"We'll see where my tribe's loyalties lie once we make our move." - Akama

name: Aura of Anger
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
Ongoing: Heroes and allies in your party have +1 ATK while attacking damaged heroes and allies.
"My soul longs for vengeance" - Illidan Stormrage

name: Bonechewer Behemoth
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
When Bonechewer Behemoth enters play, he deals 4 fire damage to target hero.
Brimstone and fire follow in his wake.

name: Bonechewer Shield Disciple
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
Protector
"Glory to the Fel Horde!"

name: Charming Courtesan
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
If Charming Courtesan would be dealt 2 or less damage, prevent it.
"That which you desire lies this way, hero."

name: Coilskar General
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
When Coilskar General enters play, put three Naga ally tokens into play 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

name: Coilskar Wrangler
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
2, Destroy an ally in your party ==> Each opponent destroys an ally in his party.
His pets are ill-treated and ill-tempered.

name: Crushing Shadows
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
Each opponent discards a random card, and your hero deals shadow damage to his hero equal to that card's cost.
Its darkness can strangle heroes and suffocate hope.

name: Doom Blossom
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
Attach to target hero or ally, and put three blossom counters on Doom Blossom.
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character for each blossom counter, and then you remove one. If none remain, destroy Doom Blossom.

name: Fel Geyser
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
Ongoing: Opposing quests have "As an additional cost to complete, turn another one of your quests face down."
Gurtogg Bloodboil's taste for destruction has a way of erupting onto his foes.

name: Fel-Acid Breath
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
Target opponent chooses three allies in his party, in order. Your hero deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.

name: Hateful Strike
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
If target player has exactly one ally in his party, destroy it.
A strike borne of malice and executed with hatred.

name: Illidari Archon
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
When Illidari Archon attacks, you may ready one of your resources.
Their souls are committed to the darkest of purposes.

name: Illidari Blood Lord
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
When Illidari Blood Lord enters play, each player turns one of his face-up resources face down.
"This world belongs to the Illidari."

name: Needle Spine
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
When target hero or ally deals combat damage to your defending hero this turn, your hero also deals that much ranged damage to it.
"My patience has run out! Die! Die!"

name: Priestess of Dementia
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
2, Destroy an ally in your party ==> Each opponent destroys an ability or equipment he controls.
She spreads the Betrayer's madness to every corner of the Black Temple.

name: Promenade Sentinel
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
When Promenade Sentinel enters play, it deals 2 arcane damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.
"Unauthorized entry detected. Engaging annihilation protocols."

name: Sister of Pain
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
When Sister of Pain attacks, she deals 1 shadow damage to target opposing hero.
"Pain is inevitable, but the suffering is optional."

name: Sister of Pleasure
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
Protector
When Sister of Pleasure defends, she heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
When it comes to the needs of Illidan's troops, Mother Shahraz knows best.

name: Temple Concubine
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
If Temple Concubine would be dealt 3 or more damage, prevent it.
"Businessâ€¦or pleasure?"

name: Tidal Burst
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target opposing ally and each other opposing ally with the same cost as that ally.
"Feel the wrath of the deep!"
